short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort product with lower prices,rating in aliexpress & ebay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aliexpress & ebay shopping assistant helps you to sorting similar product with different price.You can also sort product with rating.
This extension helps you to find the same product with lower cost also have the option to export product as csv file.
For dropshipper this features is more helpful cause you can get the product with lower cost and no need to find  product manually .
Just go to aliexpress or ebay website search for the product you want and click on the extension logo you will get the option.

So,have  a try.Thank you
